statements: DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'Warehouse A';
DELETE FROM inventory_levels WHERE quantity < 10 OR last_updated < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND quantity_sold > 5;

DELETE FROM Product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND stock_location = 'Warehouse A';

DELETE FROM Transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'return' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
